with the argument of this essay. Such cases include abortion when continua-
tion of a pregnancy endangers a woman’s life and abortion when the fetus
is anencephalic. When I speak of the wrongness of abortion in this essay, a
reader should presume the above qualifications. I mean by an abortion an
